diagnosis: The primary issue preventing profitability is the absence of executed trades, indicating overly stringent entry criteria that may cause the strategy to miss viable trading opportunities.
rootCauses: Entry quality filters are set too strictly, leading to missed trades.
The configuration for HTF alignment and structural confirmations is too rigid, limiting trade entries.
Trade frequency limits are too conservative, preventing taking multiple legitimate trades.
Market conditions are not being sufficiently evaluated, potentially missing opportunities in trending environments.
The requirement for both a liquidity sweep and displacement candle may be overly restrictive.

suggestions.description: Relax entry quality filters to allow more trades.
codeChanges: src/config/executionFilterConfig.ts (XAUUSD section) - change requireBosInDirection to false
src/config/executionFilterConfig.ts (XAUUSD section) - change requireLiquiditySweep to false
src/config/executionFilterConfig.ts (XAUUSD section) - change requireDisplacementCandle to false
suggestions.reasoning: Allowing trades without strict adherence to all entry quality filters increases the number of potential trades, making it more likely to capture profitable setups.

suggestions.description: Implement a market condition evaluation to filter trades based on volatility or trend.
codeChanges: src/strategy/v2/M1ExecutionService.ts (checkExecution function) - add check for trending market conditions
suggestions.reasoning: By adjusting the sideway market filter, the strategy can take advantage of trades in trending markets, which are often more profitable.

suggestions.description: Increase max trades per day and reduce minimum minutes between trades.
suggestions.reasoning: Increasing the trade frequency allows the algorithm to capitalize on more opportunities throughout the day, improving overall trade capture.

suggestions.description: Adjust take profit to be more realistic based on historical volatility.
codeChanges: src/strategy/v2/M1ExecutionService.ts (checkExecution function) - modify TP calculation to be based on ATR
suggestions.reasoning: Setting a more achievable take profit level can improve win rates, aligning expectations with market movements.

suggestions.description: Refine stop loss placement to be less aggressive.
codeChanges: src/strategy/v2/M1ExecutionService.ts (constructor) - increase SL buffer to allow more breathing room
suggestions.reasoning: A wider stop loss will reduce the likelihood of being stopped out prematurely in volatile conditions, allowing trades to work.

expectedImpact: These changes are expected to significantly increase the number of trades executed, enhance win rates, and improve overall performance metrics, ultimately progressing towards profitability.
